Description: What a great guitar , does it all ! Coil tap humbuckers, Piezo and tremolo ! + EZ lock locking tuners. Guitars that play this well and have these features would easily be well over $1000 ! My son has been using this and really enjoying it but he uses some very strange drop tunings, with the changing tunings we have decided to get a fixed bridge guitar. Some " dents" and surface scuffs and wear, but nothing of consequence. Just an absolutely wonderful guitar. comes with a hard case that is in great shape. The neck on this guitar is fantastic, so comfortable and fast, I play early 90's USA G&L's , I love the feel of this guitar . If I wasn't so addicted to the sound of G&L MFD pickups I would be keeping it for myself.**Ask questions prior to bid/ purchase, I ship fast usually via Fedex , Continental USA only ! ***A player's guitar with the signature capabilities of the high-end Fly in a beautiful mahogany body.The Parker P-44V Electric Guitar has a light, ergonomic body made of a single piece of mahogany that offers plenty of sustain. A bolt-on maple neck has a smooth, durable phenolic resin fingerboard. Twin Parker Stinger pickups supply plenty of dirt and the ability to coil-tap these humbuckers gives you both single- and double-coil tones. Beneath the Parker Dragonfly's fulcrum style tremolo bridge is a Fishman piezo saddle pickup that is enhanced with a Custom Fishman stereo preamp to give you a realistic acoustic voice. Other features on this electric guitar include a black polycarbonate nut, nickel-silver hardware.. The Parker P-44V guitar, and all P series axes, provide the signature capabilities of the high-end Parker Fly guitars including unmatched tone and versatility. FEATURESParker P-44VTones/Sounds: Sweet, full-midrange; singing upper register with immediate response.BodyWood: MahoganyConstruction: Solid one-pieceFinish: PolyurethaneBridge: Parker bridge with Fishman piezo saddlesVibrato System: Parker VibratoNeckWood: MapleNeck Design: Solid one-pieceNeck-Body Joint: Traditional bolt onScale: 25.5"Number of Frets: 22 FretsFret Material: Nickel silverFret Size: .060" high, .090" wideFret Board: PhenolicFretboard Shape: 12" radiusNeck Shape: Width: Regular; Thickness: FatNut: Black polycarbonateNut Width: 1.650"String Spacing: at Bridge: 2.038; at Nut: 1.325Truss Rod: Traditional designTuners: Grover 18:1 RatioElectronicsMagnetic Pickups: Parker Stingers with Alnico magnetsMagnetic pickup Configuration: Dual humbuckersMagnetic Pickup Select: 3-way pickup selection with push-pull coil tapPiezo System: Fishman piezo bridgePreAmp/Mixer: Active Custom Fishman stereo preampOther Controls: volume, tone, Piezo volume, Mag/Piezo 3-way selectorOutput: Split stereo or summed monoMiscellaneousWeight: 7 poundsStrings: .009" – .042"
Title: PARKER P-44V Electric Guitar ( Fly features )  hard case , coil tap & Piezo !
